summary: Create a marketing website for the cybersecurity startup MJ CySec.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cybersecurity startup wordmark logo reading “MJ CySec”, modern geometric style, dark-mode friendly (mj-cysec-logo.dim_1024x256.png)
- Abstract cybersecurity hero background with subtle network/mesh lines and glow accents on a dark charcoal base (mj-cysec-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Set of 3 minimal line icons in a consistent style (shield, vulnerability scan, compliance checklist) on transparent background (mj-cysec-service-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the cybersecurity startup named “MJ CySec” with a clear structure, polished copy in English, and strong calls-to-action.
Implement standard marketing pages/sections suitable for a cybersecurity startup: Home (hero + trust/value props), Services, About, and Contact.
Add a Contact form submission flow that persists submissions in the Motoko canister and provides a success/error state in the UI.
Apply a coherent, cybersecurity-appropriate visual theme and design system across the site (typography, spacing, components, and color palette) with a distinct style (avoid blue/purple by default).
Add basic SEO and social sharing metadata for MJ CySec (title, description, OpenGraph/Twitter card) and ensure the site has a clean, professional browser tab title.

Render the generated brand images as static assets in the frontend (store them under frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the layout (logo in header/footer, hero visual on the homepage, icons in services).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for the cybersecurity startup MJ CySec.
